info.author: Joe Esposito
info.description:
Grip
----

Render local readme files before sending off to GitHub.


Grip is easy to set up
``````````````````````

::

    $ pip install grip
    $ cd myproject
    $ grip


Links
`````

* `Website <http://github.com/joeyespo/grip>`_
